select count(*) from product t where 1=1
and t.product_name like concat('%',#{product_name},'%')

select t.*,c.ProvinceID,b.CityID,a.DistrictID from product t left join s_district a on t.district=a.DistrictID left join s_city b on a.CityID=b.CityID left join s_province c on b.ProvinceID=c.ProvinceID where t.product_id = #{product_id}
mapper.insert: insert into product(product_name, product_price, description, feature, price_description, stroke, notice, create_date, filepath, state, district) values(#{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{description}, #{feature}, #{price_description}, #{stroke}, #{notice}, current_timestamp, #{filepath}, 0, #{district})
mapper.update: update product set product_name = #{product_name}, product_price = #{product_price}, description = #{description}, feature = #{feature}, price_description = #{price_description}, stroke = #{stroke}, notice = #{notice}, filepath = #{filepath}, district = #{district} where product_id = #{product_id}
update product set state = 1 - state where product_id = #{product_id}
